name: Lost to Riches (Centennial Game Development Program)
name_original: Lost to Riches (Centennial Game Development Program)
description: Welcome to the Velvet Angel! You play as a gambler named Jimmy in this Action Rogue Lite Shooter, where you must fight your way through a legion of demon security in Hell's casino! Fight your way out using a variety of different items, find the combination that works for you. Gather cash and casino chips in an attempt to make yourself stronger by using the casino's infernal energies against it to break your hellish curse and save yourself from a fate of repeating Undeath over and over again!
